documentation.text: @notice Seat owner asks to start activation. Requires Constitution acceptance.
@notice Validators approve. When approvals reach thresholdK => ACTIVE.
@notice Optional admin override (useful for MVP ops). Court bans/freeze still apply via isActive().
@notice Reset approvals if you want to restart the process (MVP tool).
@notice Convenience: returns current status plus court flags.
@notice Update constitution hash/version (in production route through ConstitutionRegistry + timelock).

documentation.text: @notice Returns the digest that must be signed for acceptance.

@notice Accept constitution by presenting EIP-712 signature from `user`.
 @dev Anyone can submit the signature; signature must match `user`.
@notice Accept constitution by sending a transaction (useful when Altan wallet is native).
